title: Fullstack Developer
desc: Designing and coding beauty in every line - making the simple incredibly beautiful.

details.title: Hello, I'm Emir. Nice to meet you.
details.desc: For over 3 years, I've been successfully working with JavaScript. My experience includes collaborating with international distributed teams and developing projects for major organizations and government projects. Outside of work, I'm learning English and preparing for B2 level certification with the goal of reaching a confident C1 level. I'm always open to new knowledge and regularly elevate my skills.

design.title: Design
design.desc: I appreciate a simple content structure, clean design templates, and thoughtful interactions.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.desc: I love writing code from scratch, bringing ideas to life in the browser.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.desc: My code is the realization of ideas brought to life in your browser.

footer.title: Living, learning, and leveling up day by day.
